oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 4th Avenue North Looking East Toward Courthouse, c.1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of 4th Avenue North looking east toward the Davidson County Courthouse, c.1940s. H.G. Hill Grocery Store, Ella's Eat Shop, and the YMCA are visible. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); H.G. Hill (Nashville, Tenn.); Young Men's Christian Association of Nashville;
